snippet.title: Zombie Revenge | Promo, Preview | Sega Dreamcast
snippet.description:
Brought to you by: http://masternessp.com
See More: http://www.youtube.com/user/MNPGameVideos/videos

Zombie Revenge Promo Preview

Zombie Revenge (ゾンビ・リベンジ) is an arcade and Dreamcast video game released in 1999, a beat 'em up game. Armed with their fists, feet, and whatever weapons they should find along the way, players are tasked with ridding an unnamed city of zombies. Originally titled Blood Bullet: The House of the Dead Side Story, the game was later renamed Zombies Nightmare before Sega decided on the name Zombie Revenge.

This game also serves as a spinoff to Sega's popular House of the Dead series of light gun games and contains numerous references to its parent series. A port of the game for the PlayStation 2 was to be released by Acclaim Entertainment, but was eventually canceled.
